channel.title: Bugs/Glitches Reports
channel.description: Report Bugs and Glitches for Decimation here!

item.title: Lag problems
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lewux)
item.dc:creator: Lewux
item.content:encoded: I wanted to be able to use antilag mods for my game. When I go into some server, he hangs up pretty well, but he gives some very abrupt fights, which happen every 10 seconds.

item.title: what?!?!!?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jop890)
item.dc:creator: Jop890
item.content:encoded: i was going to play new york city 1 but i have 2 mods weird i don't have more mods in the mods folder! mods in:Decimation Decimation voice chat

item.title: Got killed in Safezone
item.author: invalid@example.com (Facemacker75)
item.dc:creator: Facemacker75
item.content:encoded: I shoot on somebody 1 Meteraway from the safezone line. After that 2 other guys shoot on me i run back to the Safe zone but they didn't stop shooting and killed me after I was in middle of the safe zone. I was full equiped pls give my stuff back.

item.title: Cant play on any servers
item.author: invalid@example.com (PhantomODeOpera)
item.dc:creator: PhantomODeOpera
item.content:encoded: Hey there. I have the new Decimation Battlegrounds and well it says to Update at the home/main menu when i got to play. But when i do then reload the pack, it shows only 3 mods. Forge modloader and 2 others that are for forge. I dont see anything for singleplayer either when i play. I dont know if this is a bug or glitch or something. But it wont let me play the pack properly. What should i do?

item.title: Decimation Anticheat?
item.author: invalid@example.com (JonisNR1)
item.dc:creator: JonisNR1
item.content:encoded:
Good evening,

I downloaded Decimation a while ago and tried to enter into a server "New York City", and it said that an anticheat was detected?

The only mods I have in my Mods folder are Decimation, DecimationVoiceChat, and OptiFine_1.7.10_HD_U_E3.

Please help!

Thank you

item.title: Out of the map glitch.
item.author: invalid@example.com (FilthyJacket)
item.dc:creator: FilthyJacket
item.content:encoded:
I was planning to play some decimation ,and i relise i can't play New York so i decided to play bukovka after a while i join the New York City map and i just fell Out of the map and lost all of my gears.

Please fix .

By any chance ,can i have my gears back?

item.title: Single Player Looting and Defining Regions.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lewbae)
item.dc:creator: Lewbae
item.content:encoded:
Hiya!

I'm trying to make a single player / LAN experience map for a YouTube series but i'm hitting a few snags. Despite placing the props and loot boxes i'm completely unable to loot them, the problem also extends to supply drops.
Another issue is that there doesn't seem to be any /deci commands to name and control areas selected by the wand of selection.
I was wondering if there could be a fix for the looting anytime soon as it would be pretty integral for the video experience. I'm less...

Single Player Looting and Defining Regions.

item.title: Stuck
item.author: invalid@example.com (Whitedrago)
item.dc:creator: Whitedrago
item.content:encoded: At the coordinates x: 304, y: 59, z:173 on the New York server, there is a roof top that is impossible to get off of that I am currently stuck in.

item.title: Crash?
item.author: invalid@example.com (CurSe)
item.dc:creator: CurSe
item.content:encoded: I recently downloaded Decimation and tried it out. It is a very well made mod pack and I truly enjoy it. Although I had attempted to try out the, “Decimation” option for single player world type. But it would not create any sort of load and would not present me with any message. Please fix this.

item.title: crash
item.author: invalid@example.com (jujulo62)
item.dc:creator: jujulo62
item.content:encoded: I tried to connect 4 times but even in the main menu the game crash and says :java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Class is not registered: net.mcdecimation.discord.main.servermanager.sendandreceive.Request_FromClient_PlayerCount.

item.title: Random crash after joining into game
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wfox7)
item.dc:creator: Wfox7
item.content:encoded:
The game crashed whilst unexpected error
Error: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Class is not registered: net.mcdecimation.discord.main.servermanager.sendandreceive.Request_FromClient_PlayerCount.
Version 0.26f

item.title: Anticheat bug
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dankieez)
item.dc:creator: Dankieez
item.content:encoded: Everytime I die, it logs me out saying something about anticheat and when i join back im still where i died but with nothing, i've tried with technic launcher, twitch and the native launcher but none of them work am I doing something wrong?

item.title: Unable to join after death.
item.author: invalid@example.com (MendedWings)
item.dc:creator: MendedWings
item.content:encoded: I died in a gunfight, the bug where you respawn where you died happened and i died again. After this happened a 3rd time i decided that instead of losing all of my caps i would just disconnect. It seems that doing that glitched me and made me unable to reconnect. Every-time i do i disconnect again. Happens only on New York map but i can join the other map just fine. I dont really know what to do? Could i get a reset on my character or something?

item.title: Anticheat and Liteloader
item.author: invalid@example.com (_creepersbane)
item.dc:creator: _creepersbane
item.content:encoded:
First off, I will say that I will NOT disclose the exact method that I used to make litemods work with decimation in public. If a staff member wants to know I will PM them.

Well, I said it all above. i was able to get VoxelMap working with Decimation. I do have a video that I will upload ASAP.

How to patch: easy, just blacklist .litemod files :P

item.title: Shotgun ammo and firing
item.author: invalid@example.com (Shiankasuiso)
item.dc:creator: Shiankasuiso
item.content:encoded: its glitches when you reload the shotgun and it still has ammo in it. for the R870 when you reload with ammo still in the mag the ammo sets to 4, but with empty tube and empty chamber it sets to 5. the same is true for the KS-23, and as far as I know all other pump action shotguns. The R870 I had glitched and stopped firing after reloading too many times with ammo still in the mag. i have noticed a similar ammo glitch with revolvers but not as bad.

item.title: Game Starting Glitch
item.author: invalid@example.com (JackHatesPeanuts)
item.dc:creator: JackHatesPeanuts
item.content:encoded:
I dont know much about anything in this field of minecraft, but I do know that it is not normal for my game to periodically crash randomly within five minutes of starting my game. Whenever I start my game, it acts normal, I play at over 60-150 fps while I play, but the second I start going through my settings and start clicking buttons, it gets very laggy and whenever I click a done button, as in, ANY BUTTON THAT SAYS (DONE), I get a long lag spike lasting 5-20 seconds. Averagely 15 seconds...

Game Starting Glitch

what i have to do to solve this problem?

item.title: Downloading loot config file from the server
item.author: invalid@example.com (Andera412)
item.dc:creator: Andera412
item.content:encoded:
Loot config now downloads from File Server (Global)
Click to expand...
How to disable global loot config file? I want to create my own config. What jar class downloads and updates the file?
